info.description: Customer service, contains operations for getting basic customer data and search customers
info.title: CustomerService.v2

get.description: Operation returns customer information with: party, primary address, contact address, primary identification document, primary email and phone.

400.description: Validation error - mostly invalid data in request is provided provided

401.description: Authentication information is missing or is invalid

403.description: You are not authorized to run this operation

post.description: Operation returns customer information with: party, primary address, contact address, primary identification document, primary email and phone.

400.description: Validation error - mostly invalid data in request is provided provided

401.description: Authentication information is missing or is invalid

403.description: You are not authorized to run this operation

get.description: Operation search customers according input parameters

parameters.name: numberOfEntries
parameters.description: Number of entries to return. When not specified or when is greater than 100 then 100 is applied.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Surname/company name filter - primary filter. Surname or company name can be used with mask - at least 3 marks + * (example: Komer* for Komercni Banka)

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: First name filter - can be used only as additional filter to surname for Natural Person. First name can be used with mask - at least 3 marks + *

parameters.name: birthEstablishedDate
parameters.description: Birth date/Established date filter, can be used only as additional filter with other filters

parameters.name: identifierTypeCode
parameters.description: Identifier type filter, additional filter to identifierValue. When not specified then all identifier types are used. RDM codebook CB_JuridicalPersonIdentificationType.

parameters.name: idDocumentTypeCode
parameters.description: Type of identification document. Can be used only with idDocumentNumber and idDocumentIssuingCountryCode. RDM codebook CB_IdentificationDocumentType

parameters.name: idDocumentNumber
parameters.description: Identification document number. Can be used only with idDocumentTypeCode and idDocumentIssuingCountryCode.

parameters.name: idDocumentIssuingCountryCode
parameters.description: Identification document issuing country code. Can be used only with idDocumentTypeCode and idDocumentNumber. RDM codebook CB_Country.

parameters.name: isInKbi
parameters.description:
Flag indicating whether subject should or should not be in KBI. Possible variants:
  • parameter is not used - all subject are returned
  • true - only subjects in KBI are returned
  • false - only subjects not in KBI are returned

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether archived customers will be returned

parameters.name: showSegment
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether segment (fixed and float) should be returned in response

parameters.name: showOnlyIdentified
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether unidentified subjects should filtered out from result

400.description: Validation error - mostly invalid data in request is provided provided

401.description: Authentication information is missing or is invalid

403.description: You are not authorized to run this operation

CustomerInfo.description: Customer base information entity - contains party, primary address, contact address, primary phone and email, customer segments and economic classifications.

isInKbi.description: Flag indicating whether subject is in KBI system

isPoliticallyExposed.description:
Flag indicating that customer is politically exposed.
If the value of the item is 'true', politicalExposition is also returned.
If the value is not returned, the information about political exposition is not collected.

isLegallyIncapable.description: Flag indicating that customer is legally incapable. Only for Natural Person. Mandatory for Natural Person.

Party.description: Party entity. Only one of attributes naturalPersonAttributes, entrepreneurAttributes, legalPersonAttributes will be filled according to legalStatus.

legalStatus.description: P - for Natural Person, E - for Entrepreneur, B - for Legal Person

LegalPersonAttributes.description: Attributes for party of type Legal Person

name.description: Company name. Is filled with name from business register. When name from business register does not exists, KB custom search name is used instead.

businessRegisterName.description: Company name. Name from business register.

EntrepreneurAttributes.description: Attributes for Party of type Entrepreneur

name.description: Entrepreneur name. Is filled with name from business register. When name from business register does not exists, KB custom search name is used instead.
name.example: Prof. MUDr. Roman Prymula, CSc. Ph.D.

businessRegisterName.description: Entrepreneur name. Name from business register.
businessRegisterName.example: Prof. MUDr. Roman Prymula, CSc. Ph.D.

nameKb.example: Prof. MUDr. Roman Prymula, CSc. Ph.D.

NaturalPersonAttributes.description: Attributes for party of type Natural Person

title.description: Title before name, i.e. prof. Ing., gen. Ing.

initials.description: Subject initials from first name and surname

birthCountryCode.description: Land of birth - ISO 2 character code - RDM codebook CB_Country

maritalStatusCode.description: Marital status code, RDM codebook CB_MaritalStatus

code.description: Legal form code. CSC codebooks PRAV_FORM, PRAV_FORM2 (foreign legal forms)

unstructured.description: Description of legal form in the case of unknown legal form

typeCode.description: Identifier type code. RDM codebook CB_JuridicalPersonIdentificationType
Type of identification document - RDM codebook CB_IdentificationDocumentType

documentNumber.description: Official number of identification document - CDM number

issuingCountryCode.description: Document issuing country - RDM codebook CB_Country - CDM issuingCountry

issuedOn.description: When document was issued - CDM validFrom

validTo.description: Document is valid until this date

registerPlace.description: Registration in OR or other register

phoneNumber.description: Local part of phone number, including national destination code i.e. +420 777112233.

isMobile.description: Flag whether it is a mobile phone. Flag is determined only for czech and slovak phone numbers.

confirmed.description: Flag indicating that phone is confirmed by client

ComponentPhone.description: Phone split to international destination code and national part of number

phoneIDC.description: Phone international destination code, i.e. +420, +1 etc.

phoneNumber.description: Local part of phone number, including national destination code i.e. 777112233.

confirmed.description: Flag indicating that email is confirmed by client

PrimaryAddress.description: Primary address. Address is returned according to input parameter requiredAddressFormats. LINE - addressLinePoint, COMPONENT - componentAddressPoint, SINGLE_LINE - singleLineAddressPoint.

PrimaryAddressSearch.description: Primary address for search. Address is returned only in LINE format.

ContactAddress.description: Contact address. Bank correspondence delivery address. If it is not filled out, correspondence is delivered to a permanent residence address. A contact address can also be entered as a P.O. BOX. Address is returned according to input parameter requiredAddressFormats. LINE - addressLinePoint, COMPONENT - componentAddressPoint, SINGLE_LINE - singleLineAddressPoint

confirmed.description: Flag indicating that address is confirmed by client

TemporaryStayAddress.description: Temporary residence address. The address is obligatory for foreigners who do not have the Czech Republic filled in at their permanent address. Address is returned according to input parameter requiredAddressFormats. LINE - addressLinePoint, COMPONENT - componentAddressPoint, SINGLE_LINE - singleLineAddressPoint

street.description: First line of address (street, street number etc.)

postCode.description: Post code, Postal code, ZIP code. Is present for all countries, not only for czech!!

countryCode.description: Country code - two characters ISO code - RDM codebook CB_Country

street.description: Street name without a house number. The field is not filled out for cities without an street network or for post box address.

houseNumber.description: The house number. It is not filled out for post box address. Foreign addresses should have it filled out. Czech addresses may have the building number in this attribute or the evidenceNumber.

evidenceNumber.description: Evidence number. It is not filled out for post box address. Used only for Czech addresses. The evidence number has objects that are not assigned a house number. These are, for example, chalets.

streetNumber.description: Street number. It is not filled out for post box address. Used only for Czech and Slovak addresses. A number that helps locate a house on a given street.

cityDistrict.description: City district. It is not filled out for post box address. Should be filled for all Czech addresses, at least for that with address point id.

pragueDistrict.description: Territory of the city district in the capital Prague (Praha 1 - 10 not Praha 1 - 22). It is not filled out for post box address.

deliveryDetails.description: A note of delivery specifying to whom delivery is intended.

city.description: The city name. Only the name of the city without its parts is given, i.e. for Prague we only mention Prague and not Prague 6 or Prague Dejvice.

postBox.description: P.O. Box number. For Czech addresses the value is number. It is filled out for post box address.

postCode.description: Post code, Postal code, ZIP code.  For czech address it should be five-digit number between 10000 - 79999

countrySubdivision.description: It is used only for foreign addresses and mainly for states which are divided into large self-governing entities. E.g. USA, then state like Texas, Florida is filled out.

countryCode.description: Country code - two characters ISO code - RDM codebook CB_Country

addressPointId.description: Address point id from Register of Territorial Identification of Addresses and Properties in the Czech Republic or its equivalent in the Slovak Republic.

SingleLineAddressPoint.description: Address in SINGLE_LINE format. Single line textual address representation. Whole address is one textual line.

AddressFormat.description:
Type of the address format.
* 'LINE'      - Address format in the form of address lines. An easy-to-read form for users. It is used, for example, for an address on a letter or a contractual document, or to display address to user in application. This notation returns in the Address schema definition
* 'COMPONENT' - Address format in the form of address components. Harder for users to read form. Component writing is used primarily to enter an address or to exchange an address for machine processing. This notation returns in the ComponentAddress schema definition.
* 'SINGLE_LINE' - Address format in single line. Mainly used for visual presentation of address.

segmentKeyCode.description: Synthetic segment key code (connection of segmentCode + subsegmentCode) for referencing RDM codebook CB_CustomerSegment

isThereMore.description: Flag indicating whether search result can return more rows

restrictedCustomer.description: Customer of bank to which access is restricted. For example, an employee is considered to be restricted.

PartySearchResult.description: Party search result. Only one of attributes naturalPersonAttributes, entrepreneurAttributes, legalPersonAttributes will be filled according to legalStatus.

legalStatus.description: P - for Natural Person, E - for Entrepreneur, B - for Legal Person

LegalPersonAttributesSearch.description: Attributes for party of type Legal Person

name.description: Company name. Is filled with name from business register. When name from business register does not exists, KB custom search name is used instead.

businessRegisterName.description: Company name. Name from business register.

nameKb.description: Custom KB search name. This field is used for searching.

EntrepreneurAttributesSearch.description: Attributes for party type of Entrepreneur

name.description: Entrepreneur name. Is filled with name from business register. When name from business register does not exists, KB custom search name is used instead.

businessRegisterName.description: Entrepreneur name. Name from business register.

nameKb.description: Custom KB search name. This field is used for searching.

NaturalPersonAttributesSearch.description: Attributes for party type of Natural Person

title.description: Title before name, i.e. prof. Ing., gen. Ing.

LifecycleStatusEnum.description:
Customer lifecycle status. There are lifecycle statuses:
* 'ACTIVE' - active subject (GDPR 10 status)
* 'INACTIVE' - former subject (GDPR 20 status), has no products or services in bank
* 'ARCHIVED' - archived subject (GDPR 30 status) - only dedicated consumers can access these subjects

CustomerIdentification.description: The customer's identification entity. Entity contains method, identificaiton date and identifying company.

identificationMethodCode.description: Code of the method of identifying the subject. Value is defined in the code list CB_IdentificationMethodType

identificationDate.description: The date and time the subject was first identified.

czechIdentificationNumber.description: Czech identification number of the company that made the subject identification. Value is mandatory only for specific identification method codes. See CB_IdentificationMethodType.

statusCode.description: FATCA status code - RDM codebook CB_FATCAStatus

netMonthEarningCode.description: Code of interval net monthly earning - CM Codebook of net month earnings - EP_C_NET_MONTH_EARNING

categoryCode.description: Profession category code - codebook CSC PROF_CAT1, RDM CB_Prof_Cat1

code.description: Code of the source of earnings - CSC codebook ZDROJ_PRIJ

description.description: Description of the source of earnings- only for code 6 / 'other source'
Description of housing - only for code 'OT' / 'other'

esaCode.description: Economic sector code according to ESA2010 as amended by the CNB - RDM codebook CB_ESAInstitutionalSectorCNB

isInsurable.description: Flag indicating that customer is insurable

NaturalPersonKyc.description: Natural person KYC data. Object is only present when customer is type of NaturalPerson.

naceCode.description: Code of economic activity according to the new classification of economic activities Only for Juridical Person - RDM codebook CB_NACECode

JuridicalPersonKyc.description: Juridical person KYC data. Object is only present when customer is type of JuridicalPerson.

functionCode.description: Code of political office. Value must match CB_PoliticallyExposedPersonFunction code list

functionDescription.description: Text description of the function. Description is mandatory when the function code is set to a value that has the mandatory_note flag set to true in the CB_PoliticallyExposedPersonFunction code list.

levelCode.description: Risk level of a politically exposed person. Value from code list CB_PoliticallyExposedPersonLevel

statusCode.description: Status of politically exposed person. The value should match the code list CB_PoliticallyExposedPersonStatus. Two values are defined ACTIVE - if in office and PASSIVE - should be set three years after the end of public office.

countryCode.description: Country of political office, two-letter ISO code, defined in RDM codebook CB_Country.

endDateOfPoliticalActivity.description: Date of termination of public office, may even be foreseen for the future. When the date expires, the status should be set to passive.

BRSubscription.description: Information about subscription for update from the Basic registry

isSubscribed.description: Information if customer subscribed for update from the Basic registry

code.description: Code of the type of customer's relationship with KB - CSC codebook CLI_KB_REL

companyCode.description: Financial group company code - only for code 'A' - RDM codebook CB_KBGroupCompany

validFrom.description: Date of beginning of tax residence

legalEntityTypeCode.description: Type of legal entity - Values are defined in CSC codebook PRAVT_CRS

residenceCountries.description: List of Countries with TIN, where customer is tax resident

countryCode.description: Country code of tax residence - two characters ISO code - CB_Country.

tinMissingReasonDescription.description: Reason why TIN was not filled out

countryCode.description: Country code of tax domicile - two characters ISO code - RDM codebook CB_Country

validTo.description: Date of end of tax domicile

allContactsConfirmed.description: Information if all customer contacts are confirmed

atLeastOneConfirmedContact.description: Information if at least one confirmed contact is confirmed(phone or email)

DataEntity.description:
Data entity to be returned.
* 'ADDRESS_PRIMARY' - primary address
* 'ADDRESS_CONTACT' - contact address
* 'ADDRESS_TEMPORARY_STAY' - temporary stay address
* 'ID_DOC_PRIMARY' - primary identification document
* 'CUSTOMER_IDENTIFICATION' - customer identification
* 'PHONE_PRIMARY' - primary phone
* 'EMAIL_PRIMARY' - primary email
* 'SEGMENT' - segment
* 'POLITICAL_EXPOSITION' - political exposition
* 'ESA' - ESA classification
* 'NACE' - NACE classification
* 'INSURABILITY' - insurability
* 'FIRST_NAME_VOCATIVE' - firstname vocative
* 'SURNAME_VOCATIVE' - surname vocative
* 'FATCA' - FATCA
* 'FINANCIAL_PROFILE' - financial profile like main source of earnings, net month earning etc.
* 'HOUSING' - housing
* 'EDUCATION' - education
* 'EMPLOYMENT' - employment
* 'TURNOVERS' - turnovers
* 'EMPLOYEES_NUMBER' - number of employees
* 'BUSINESS_AREA' - business area
* 'BR_SUBSCRIPTION' - basic registry information
* 'TAX_RESIDENCE' - tax residence
* 'TAX_DOMICILE' - tax domicile
* 'KB_RELATIONSHIP' - type of relationship with KB
* 'CONFIRMED_CONTACT_FLAGS' - information about confirmed contacts

CustomerId.name: customerId
CustomerId.description: Identifier of the customer (KBID - identifier of customer in Customer Management system)

RequiredEntities.name: e
RequiredEntities.description: Required data entities to be returned. When non specified, only party is returned.

IncludeArchived.name: includeArchived
IncludeArchived.description: Flag indicating whether archived customer will be returned

GetAllPrimaryPhones.name: getAllPrimaryPhones
GetAllPrimaryPhones.description: Flag indicating whether all available types of primary phone should be returned when primary phone is required. In order 5,1,3

RequiredAddressFormats.name: requiredAddressFormats
RequiredAddressFormats.description: Required address format. Multiple formats can be returned at the same time. If no format is defined, the LINE address format is returned.
